entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:59 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
